agency_date.map: function(doc){var record_date = doc.date_;var record_date = record_date.substring(0,10);if (doc.docType=='account'){emit([doc.parentAgency,record_date], doc.accountID);}}

date.map: function(doc){var record_date = doc.date_;var record_date = record_date.substring(0,10);if (doc.docType=='account'){emit(record_date, doc.accountID);}}
